# 02 Global Macro Database

Downloading the dataset from [global macro database](https://www.globalmacrodata.com/), which covers a wide range of macroeconomic indicators across various countries, sourced from IMF, WB etc

```{r}
# install.packages("devtools")
# devtools::install_github("KMueller-Lab/Global-Macro-Database-R")
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(globalmacrodata)
```

## Data

```{r}
gmd <- gmd(version = "2025_09")
```

## Selection

```{r}
df_f <- gmd %>%
  select(
    ISO3, year, CPI, infl, cbrate, USDfx, REER, HPI, unemp, inv_GDP, gen_govexp_GDP, gen_govrev_GDP, govdebt_GDP
  ) %>%
  filter(
    year >= 1990,
    year <= 2025,
  ) %>%
  rename(
    
  )
```

## Save

```{r}
write_csv(df_f, "../../data/processed/02_GMD.csv")
write_dta(df_f, "../../data/processed/02_GMD.dta")
```
